### Supported DXVK Forks

| Fork | Source |
|------|--------|
| Official | [doitsujin/dxvk](https://github.com/doitsujin/dxvk) |
| GPL Async | [Ph42oN/dxvk-gplasync](https://gitlab.com/Ph42oN/dxvk-gplasync) |
| NVAPI | [jp7677/dxvk-nvapi](https://github.com/jp7677/dxvk-nvapi) |

### Download

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `DXVK.Studio.Setup.1.0.0.exe` | Installer (recommended) |
| `DXVK.Studio.1.0.0.exe` | Portable version |

### Requirements

- Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
- Vulkan-capable GPU
